alert.note: Alert for Dorado; Vega Alta (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 30 at 11:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Dorado and Vega Alta. * WHEN...Until 100 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1100 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Vega Alta, Dorado, Toa Baja, Toa Alta, Ceiba, Monserrate, Rio Lajas, Brenas, Miranda, Ingenio, San Antonio and Sabana. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
